trans-unit.source: Remember to create a sys folder to store copy of file, and parameter your extensions.

TS must be define in order to declare wich domain/model will let us get export. This example show standard configuration. Repository is automaticaly calculated, but can be specified using "repository" key.
Export use standard default template in order to display all field in TCA/table/interface/showRecordFieldList. Date field are parsed, but relation to other table not yet.
Storage folder must be create in order to store all exported file on the server.

Domain/Repository should contain 2 functions in order to get exported limitation to work (findByExported / countByExported). This able to export only non exported data. Field name must be the same declared in TYPOSCRIPT upper.
Select data to export bellow
Data export
Reload
Please select a table to export in select menu in the header
Warning: Only table with data in this page will be displayed.
Following datas are available for export:
Can be selected
There's %d total records in this page.
There's %d unexported records in this page.
Unable to calculate number of unexported records in this page.
Export all records
Export unexported records and mark them as exported.
File list (last one on the top)
If your download do not start automaticaly, you can click on the green file name, it's your download.
File name (date) - size
